text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 2, line 28, at end insert—
“( ) In exercising a function under this Part, the Secretary of State must have regard to the obligation on local authorities to promote individual wellbeing as defined in (2) above.”
000: Clause 69, page 59, line 10, at end insert—

“( ) In advance of the first five-yearly review the Secretary of State must prepare and publish a review of the working of Part I and its funding before the date in (4) above and after consultation with interested parties.”
000: Clause 77, page 66, line 21, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) in so deciding in the case of an NHS trust, the Commission must review the effectiveness of previous interventions with that trust by the Trust Development Authority (or its predecessor bodies) and consider whether to require the Authority to advise the Secretary of State to appoint a trust special administrator.”
